analysis.title: Introduction
analysis.notes: A quiet and mysterious introduction in the strings. Sounds like winter, doesn't it?

analysis.title: Start of first section and Theme 1
analysis.notes: Note the shape of the phrases: long-short-long.

analysis.title: Clarinets: Theme 1 fragment A
analysis.notes: The clarinets restate the first three notes of Theme 1.

analysis.title: Still mysterious
analysis.notes: The next minutes feature the violin transforming Theme 1.

analysis.title: Now heroic
analysis.notes: I love this part.

analysis.title: Building...
analysis.notes: In each phrase, you can just barely hear the violin get through the first three notes of Theme 1 before going into runs.

analysis.title: And building...
analysis.notes: Runs lead up to fragments of Theme 1.

analysis.title: Coming down, then building...
analysis.notes: I'm not entirely sure how this music relates to the previous material, but it sure sounds cool.

analysis.title: ...(Clarinets: Theme 1 fragment A)...
analysis.notes: And we're still building...

analysis.title: End of first section
analysis.notes: What a finish!

analysis.title: Start of second section and Theme 2 fragments
analysis.notes: Note the shape of the phrases: climbing down and climbing up.

analysis.title: Clarinets: Theme 2 fragment A
analysis.notes: Leading up to...

analysis.title: Theme 3 fragment (!) leading to ...
analysis.notes: This may just sound like pretty rising notes, but just wait.

analysis.title: Theme 2 in full glory
analysis.notes: But also listen to the accompaniment.

analysis.title: Solo Viola: Theme 3
analysis.notes: It's so cool how these themes are interweaving.

analysis.title: Beautiful rising to...
analysis.notes: One of my favorite parts is coming up.

analysis.title: Theme 2 fragment B, serene at first...
analysis.notes: I love this part.

analysis.title: Dark
analysis.notes: Listen to what the strings are plucking.

analysis.title: Theme 3: end of second section, beginning of third
analysis.notes: This part is really fun to play.

analysis.title: That's all, folks!
analysis.notes: This is all I've got for now. Will update soon. In the meantime, you know enough about the music to understand the rest of the first movement.
